text: The Rev. Dennis David Kahekilimamaoikalanikeha Kamakahi (March 31, 1953 - April 28, 2014) was an American slack key guitarist, recording artist, music composer, and Christian minister. He has won multiple Grammy Awards. In 2009 was inducted into the Hawaiian Music Hall of Fame. Kamakahi was born in Honolulu, Hawaii. Kamakahi died in Honolulu, Hawaii from lung cancer, aged 61. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:1953 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American guitarists Category:American composers Category:Musicians from Hawaii Category:People from Honolulu
title: Dennis Kamakahi
